name: @nishans/cache
description: A cache specially designed to retrieve and store notion data in memory

name: @nishans/cli
description: A package to interact with `@nishans/core` from the terminal

name: @nishans/cms
description: A cms for notion

name: @nishans/constants
description: A small package for all notion specific constants

name: @nishans/core
description: Unofficial Notion api for node.js with all crud functionalities for Space, User, Block, Page and many more

name: @nishans/discord-bot
description: A general purpose discord bot for working with `@nishans/core` from the discord chat textbox

name: @nishans/endpoints
description: A package to expose all notion endpoints for queries and mutations

name: @nishans/errors
description: A small package containing various notion specific error classes

name: @nishans/extract
description: A small package to extract required notion data

name: @nishans/fabricator
description: A package to generate notion blocks using a simple api

name: @nishans/graphql
description: A graphql server for notion built using `@nishans/core`

name: @nishans/idz
description: A small package to validate, generate and parse notion ids

name: @nishans/init
description: A package to initialize notion view & block data

name: @nishans/inline-blocks
description: Package providing an easy to use api to generate contents for notion inline blocks

name: @nishans/lineage
description: A package to work with notion child data

name: @nishans/logger
description: A logger built specifically for nishan ecosystem

name: @nishans/markdown
description: A package to upload markdown content into notion

name: @nishans/notion-formula
description: A package to generate notion formula with ease

name: @nishans/operations
description: A package to inspect, modify and store notion operations

name: @nishans/orm
description: A package to use notion as a database by providing an easy to use orm api

name: @nishans/permissions
description: A package to easily deal with notion permissions

name: @nishans/react-filters
description: A react component that emulates notions advanced filter

name: @nishans/remark-notion
description: A remark plugin to support custom notion specific syntax for `@nishans/markdown` package

name: @nishans/schema-builder
description: A package to create notion collection schema painlessly

name: @nishans/sync
description: A package to keep local notion data in sync with remote one by storing and restoring it

name: @nishans/tasks
description: A package to enqueue and poll notion tasks

name: @nishans/traverser
description: Traverse notion data with ease

name: @nishans/typegen
description: A package to automatically generate typescript definitions from a remote notion collection schema

name: @nishans/types
description: Typescript type definitions for notion

name: @nishans/utils
description: A bunch of small utility modules used across nishans ecosystem

name: @nishans/validators
description: A group of modules to validate various things related to notion
